name: NSFetchRequestExpression
desc: An expression that evaluates the result of a fetch request on a managed object context.

items.name: class func expression(forFetch: NSExpression, context: NSExpression, countOnly: Bool) -> NSExpression
items.desc: Returns an expression which will evaluate to the result of executing a fetch request on a context.

items.name: var requestExpression: NSExpression
items.desc: The expression for the receiver’s fetch request.

items.name: var contextExpression: NSExpression
items.desc: The expression for the receiver’s managed object context.

items.name: var isCountOnlyRequest: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver represents a count-only fetch request.

items.name: let NSFetchRequestExpressionType: NSExpression.ExpressionType
items.desc: This constant specifies the fetch request expression type.
